## SUBDIV\_THIRDS\_OPEN variable

Splits each curve / line segment into 3 parts at 1/3 and 2/3. Version for open curves.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SUBDIV_THIRDS_OPEN: SubdivKernel
```
